Package com.btp.dataStructures.trees.GenericTrees

Class SplayTree<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.btp.dataStructures.trees.GenericTrees.SplayTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - generic type of objects to possibly contain in the tree instance
public class SplayTree<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
the public class for the SplayTree instances. This code is based in the tutorial found in https://www.sanfoundry.com/java-program-implement-splay-tree/, with major syntax modifications for using generic type nodes and getter/setter methods for data-scope reduction.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SplayTree()
    Constructor for the class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean contains​(T element)
    method to search for an element in the tree
    int countNodes()
    method to get the amount of nodes in the tree
    void inOrder()
    in order traversal printing method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: left subtree, root and right subtree.
    void insert​(T element)
    Calls the recursive method insert
    boolean isEmpty()
    Checks if the tree is empty
    void postorder()
    public postorder traversal method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: left subtree, right subtree, root
    void preorder()
    public preorder traversal method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: the root, the left subtree, the right subtree
    void remove​(T element)
    Removes a node with an specified element
    void zagRotation​(SplayNode<T> child, SplayNode<T> parent)
    Makes a zag rotation of the SplayTree data structure
    void zigRotation​(SplayNode<T> child, SplayNode<T> parent)
    Makes a zig rotation of the SplayTree data structure

  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the tree is empty
      Returns:
      true if the tree is empty, false if not

    • insert

      public void insert​(T element)
      Calls the recursive method insert
      Parameters:
      element - the element to be inserted

    • zigRotation

      public void zigRotation​(SplayNode<T> child, SplayNode<T> parent)
      Makes a zig rotation of the SplayTree data structure
      Parameters:
      child - child to be rotated
      parent - parent to be rotated

    • zagRotation

      public void zagRotation​(SplayNode<T> child, SplayNode<T> parent)
      Makes a zag rotation of the SplayTree data structure
      Parameters:
      child - child to be rotated
      parent - parent to be rotated

    • remove

      public void remove​(T element)
      Removes a node with an specified element
      Parameters:
      element - the element to be removed

    • countNodes

      public int countNodes()
      method to get the amount of nodes in the tree
      Returns:
      integer value for amount of nodes.

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(T element)
      method to search for an element in the tree
      Parameters:
      element - the value that is to be found
      Returns:
      boolean value, true if the value is in tree, false otherwise.

    • inOrder

      public void inOrder()
      in order traversal printing method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: left subtree, root and right subtree.

    • preorder

      public void preorder()
      public preorder traversal method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: the root, the left subtree, the right subtree

    • postorder

      public void postorder()
      public postorder traversal method this method is used to print the tree in the following order: left subtree, right subtree, root
